name: Storyteller (itch) (Tudwall, neverwyns)
description:
Our game for the Odin Project game jam! Plays with text comprehension and shape recognition.
The target age is 6 - 10 years old.

This is a WIP and will be updated before the end of the jam.

Made with ♥ by David, emdevs, mdlugosz1, and Tudwall.
Repo
